first_block.title: Give Your Feedback
first_block.subtitle_part_2: by answering a few questions. Your responses are anonymous.

success_block.title: Thank you very much!
success_block.thanks: Your feedback will help us improve the quality of service.
success_block.question: Questions about the service
success_block.further: Do you want to go further?
success_block.share: Share your experience publicly anonymously. The administration will respond and use your experience to improve its services.
success_block.alert: Your feedback has been successfully transmitted to the department handling this procedure.

comprehension.label: What did you think of the information and instructions provided?
comprehension.hint: On a scale of 1 to 5; 1 being incomprehensible and 5 being very clear.

contact_tried.label: Along the way, did you try to get help through any of the following means?

options.label: At a help desk with the administration

contact_reached.label: When you sought help, were you able to reach the administration?

contact_satisfaction.label: How do you rate the quality of the help you received from the administration?
contact_satisfaction.hint: On a scale of 1 to 5, 1 being very bad and 5 being excellent.

options.label: I lacked information before starting the procedure
The site did not display well on mobile
There was missing information about the follow-up of my request or procedure (deadline, etc.)

difficulties_details_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other difficulties you encountered?

contact.label: Did you try to contact the assistance service responsible for the procedure?

options.label: Yes, but I couldn't find how to contact them

contact_channels.label: By what means did you try to contact the procedure service?

contact_tried_verbatim.label: What other types of assistance did you use?

contact_details.label: Were you able to reach them?

options.label: I couldn't find how to contact them
I contacted them but I couldn't reach them
I contacted them and they responded

help.label: Did you need additional help for this procedure?

options.label: I asked for help from a family member or friend
I asked for help from an association

help_details_verbatim.label: Can you specify what other help you needed?

verbatim.label: Do you want to tell us more?
